reviewText: Great information for the classroom.  My students were riveted.

I purchased this as a gift for my grown son.  I later found out what he wanted was something about "Vegas Venum" ... image my surprise when I went to the website and realized I could have purchased both tapes for less than I paid for this one since they were having a sale.  The sale is over and it's still much cheaper.  Now I have to decide do I continue to just go to Amazon to look for something or if I should do some research before I purchase something.  I hate shopping (:
